title: How awesome has riot done their interactive map? i actually freaking love it :D
body:
honestly just want to say well done on the lore as well as the map. I've actually spent so long just looking around wondering where the next champ will come from and why, and looked around to where the battles have taken place!

well done guys !

replies.body:
gotta say im in love with it too.

out of curiosity, where did you find bandle city ? (assuming you found it at all)
freljord in the south mountains im pretty sure
meanwhile i find it next to the void lmfao.
I found it in the Greenfang mountains near Demacia
